name: PublishSymbols
description: Index your source code and publish symbols to a file share or Azure Artifacts symbol server
helpMarkDown: See [more information](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=613722) on how to use this task.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: SymbolsFolder
inputs.label: Path to symbols folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the folder that is searched for symbol files.  The default is $(Build.SourcesDirectory).  Otherwise specify a rooted path, for example: $(Build.BinariesDirectory)/MyProject

inputs.name: SearchPattern
inputs.label: Search pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: The pattern used to discover the pdb files to publish.

inputs.name: IndexSources
inputs.label: Index sources
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether to inject source server information into the PDB files.

inputs.name: PublishSymbols
inputs.label: Publish symbols
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether to publish the symbol files.

inputs.name: SymbolServerType
inputs.label: Symbol server type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose where to publish symbols. Symbols published to the Azure Artifacts symbol server are accessible by any user with access to the organization/collection. Azure DevOps Server only supports the "File share" option. Follow [these instructions](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=846265) to use Symbol Server in Azure Artifacts.

options.TeamServices: Symbol Server in this organization/collection (requires Azure Artifacts)

inputs.name: SymbolsPath
inputs.label: Path to publish symbols
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file share that hosts your symbols. This value will be used in the call to `symstore.exe add` as the `/s` parameter.

inputs.name: CompressSymbols
inputs.label: Compress symbols
inputs.helpMarkDown: Compress symbols when publishing to file share.

inputs.name: IndexableFileFormats
inputs.label: Symbol file formats to publish
inputs.helpMarkDown: Which debug formats to publish to the symbol server

options.Default: The Default set of symbols to upload
options.Pdb: Only Pdb based symbols Windows pdb's and managed Portable pdb's.

inputs.name: TreatNotIndexedAsWarning
inputs.label: Warn if not indexed
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether to warn if sources are not indexed for a PDB file. Otherwise the messages are logged as normal output.

inputs.name: SymbolsMaximumWaitTime
inputs.label: Max wait time (min)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of minutes to wait before failing this task.

inputs.name: SymbolsProduct
inputs.label: Product
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the product parameter to symstore.exe.  The default is $(Build.DefinitionName)

inputs.name: SymbolsVersion
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the version parameter to symstore.exe.  The default is $(Build.BuildNumber)

inputs.name: SymbolsArtifactName
inputs.label: Artifact name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the artifact name to use for the Symbols artifact.  The default is Symbols_$(BuildConfiguration)
